i am for open border if everything is private owned, from roads to hospitals so any new immigrants will have bid up the prices for good and services.

Everything else is all about costs or benefits, a new immigrants will to harm to the country if he does not have a job from day 1

- more food demand = prices go up
- less housing available = rent going up
- more money spent by the state to take care of him = rising taxes
